name: Everyday Reflections
description: Get your group sharing the small things happening in their lives right now.

name: Past & Present
description: Get your group sharing moments from growing up and now in a way that brings you closer.

name: Relationships & Connection
description: Meaningful conversations about the people who matter in your lives. Great to understand each other on a deeper level without getting heavy.

name: Hot Takes Only
description: Spicy opinions and harmless controversies to get everyone laughing. Perfect for groups who love playful debates and unfiltered honesty.

name: Mayhem
description: For groups wanting some cheeky, inside jokes and unserious fun.

name: Night Out Energy
description: Bring everyone's best night-out stories, habits, and memories together. These prompts let the group relive funny moments and share their current "going out" vibe.

name: Right Now
description: A simple way for the group to swap life updates through everyday moments. Easy prompts that make sharing feel natural and low-effort.

name: Home
description: Peek into each other's worlds by sharing the spaces and objects around you.

name: Daily Joys
description: Celebrate the little wins and simple pleasures together. These prompts help everyone share the bright spots in their everyday lives.

name: Golden Childhood
description: A warm, nostalgic set of prompts that helps the group compare childhood memories. It's a fun way to learn how everyone grew up and what shaped them.

name: Old Photos, New Stories
description: Everyone shares old pictures and the stories behind them. Perfect for sparking unexpected conversations and rediscovering forgotten moments.

name: Life Milestones
description: Prompts that help the group share the big (and small) moments that shaped their lives. It's an easy way to learn more about each person's journey.
